00024 // brushedmetal.cpp*
00025 #include "pbrt.h"
00026 #include "material.h"
00027 // BrushedMetal Class Declarations
00028 class BrushedMetal : public Material {
00029 public:
00030         BrushedMetal(Reference<Texture<float> > bump) : bumpMap(bump) { }
00031         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00032         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00033 };
00034 // BrushedMetal Method Definitions
00035 BSDF *BrushedMetal::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00036         // Declare brushedmetal coefficients
00037         static float diffuse[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
00038         static float xy0[3] =     {  -1.11854f, -1.11845f, -1.11999f  };
00039         static float z0[3] =      {   1.01272f,  1.01469f,  1.01942f  };
00040         static float e0[3] =      {  15.8708f,  15.6489f,  15.4571f   };
00041         static float xy1[3] =     {  -1.05334f, -1.06409f, -1.08378f  };
00042         static float z1[3] =      {   0.69541f,  0.662178f, 0.626672f };
00043         static float e1[3] =      { 111.267f,   88.9222f,  65.2179f   };
00044         static float xy2[3] =     {  -1.01684f, -1.01635f, -1.01529f  };
00045         static float z2[3] =      {   1.00132f,  1.00112f,  1.00108f  };
00046         static float e2[3] =      { 180.181f,  184.152f,  195.773f    };
00047         static Spectrum xy[3] = { Spectrum(xy0), Spectrum(xy1), Spectrum(xy2) };
00048         static Spectrum z[3] = { Spectrum(z0), Spectrum(z1), Spectrum(z2) };
00049         static Spectrum e[3] = { Spectrum(e0), Spectrum(e1), Spectrum(e2) };
00050         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00051         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00052         if (bumpMap)
00053                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00054         else
00055                 dgs = dgShading;
00056         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00057         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lafortune)(Spectrum(*diffuse), 3, xy, xy, z, e,
00058                 BxDFType(BSDF_REFLECTION | BSDF_GLOSSY)));
00059         return bsdf;
00060 }
00061 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00062                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00063         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00064         return new BrushedMetal(bumpMap);
00065 }
